mapper.select: select distinct c.tnum from calendar c, schedule s where c.gnum=#{gnum} and accept='yes' and c.gnum=s.gnum and c.tnum=s.tnum
select distinct c.tnum from calendar c, schedule s where c.gnum=#{gnum} and accept='wait' and c.gnum=s.gnum and c.tnum=s.tnum

select c.num, c.gnum, c.tnum, c.startdate, c.enddate, c.accept, s.pks, s.type from calendar c, schedule s where c.gnum=#{gnum} and c.tnum=#{tnum} and c.accept='yes' and c.gnum=s.gnum and c.tnum=s.tnum order by c.startdate desc
